name: monorepo_time
description: Web based GUI manager for your monorepo

scripts.dev: cd apps/web && npm run dev   && cd ../api && npm run dev
scripts.build: cd apps/web && npm run build && cd ../api && npm run build
scripts.dep: npm run build -w monorepotime && rm -rf "/home/anghelo/Desktop/Link to Projects/monotime/test/node_modules/monorepotime/dist" && cp -r "/home/anghelo/Desktop/Link to Projects/monotime/MonoTime/apps/api/dist" "/home/anghelo/Desktop/Link to Projects/monotime/test/node_modules/monorepotime/dist"
